summary: A love story between two people that each have a secret to hide. One a pro-wrestler, the other a Nun. Losing never felt so good.
cast: Tatsuhisa Suzuki|Takako Honda|Wataru Takagi|Yûko Kaida|Makiko Nitta|Shinobu Matsumoto|Mitsuaki Kanuka|Yoshihisa Kawahara|Miyuki Satô|Kokoro Kikuchi|Kyoko Chikiri|Richard Epcar|Natalie Hoover|Frank Howley|David S. Hsu|Justin Mattingly|Bérangère Rochet|Nina Sumter|Joanna Thornton|Stephen Weese
keywords: reference to shakespeare's romeo and juliet|independent film
title: Kick-Heart
